articles.title: FACTBOX-Monkeypox cases and deaths around the world
articles.description:
* SOUTH AFRICA confirmed its third case on July 11. * TURKEY reported first case on June 30.
* The UNITED ARAB EMIRATES had reported 16 infections as of July 24. AMERICAS * ARGENTINA had confirmed 20 cases as of July 26. * The BAHAMAS confirmed its first case on June 24.
articles.content: More than 75 countries where monkeypox is not endemic have reported outbreaks of the viral disease, which the World Health Organization has declared a global health emergency, as confirmed cases crossed 25,000 and non-endemic countries reported first... [4280 chars]

articles.title: U.S. asks Argentina to seize grounded Iranian plane
articles.description: The United States has asked authorities in Argentina for permission to take possession of an Iranian plane grounded in the country on accusations of being connected to sanctioned Iranian and Venezuelan companies.
articles.content:
U.S. prosecutors asked Argentina on Tuesday for permission to taken possession of an Iranian aircraft. Photo courtesy of Justice Department

articles.title: PREVIEW-Rugby-Argentina look to build on Scotland win in Rugby Championship
articles.description: The appointment of Australian Michael Cheika as head coach in March is a game-changer for them, bringing some structure to what is a talented, but at times gung-ho, squad of players. His experience of taking on New Zealand and South Africa during five years as coach of the Wallabies cannot be discounted, and he knows this Argentina squad well having been a consultant to the team since 2020.
articles.content:
Argentina head into the Rugby Championship on the back of a morale-boosting 2-1 home series win over Scotland last month, some respite from a dismal run of results as they welcome Australia for back-to-back home games starting on Saturday.
The Pumas ... [2136 chars]

articles.title: South American Countries Launch Official 2030 FIFA World Cup Bid
articles.description: The idea of a joint South American bid for the 2030 tournament was first mooted by Uruguay and Argentina in 2017 and two years later the four potential hosts had been established
articles.content:
Four South American countries on Tuesday launched an unprecedented joint bid to host the centenary 2030 World Cup with the hope of bringing the global showpiece back to its first home.
